event.title: SFSCON '25 - Ethical Need for Medical Devices as Commons in Bolzano, Italy
event.p: Martin Häuer (Martin-Luther Universität Halle-Wittenberg; Open Source Imaging Initiative e.V.) explains in this talk the Open Source Imaging Initiative (OSI²), which has developed an Free Software MRI scanner. This MRI scanner is counteracting the MRI oligopoly and opening up clinical certification. This talk will give an overview of the ethics of the project, its current state and vision.
